entries.femaleVariant: You want to be a nomad, you better talk like a nomad. They won't ever accept you otherwise.
The vehicle is the nexus of their world. From their perspective, it is the ground that moves, as it were, not they.
You know, I've noticed something. Born nomads have an entirely different conception of time and space.
Listen, professor... Keep those deep thoughts to yourself, all right?
Now, I know you don't mean anything â€“ but people might get the feeling you think you're better than them.
